item.title: Introduction to Ingressing With Kubernetes
item.description: Single responsibility is a magical notion. Whatever it touches, it makes it more manageable and efficient. With _Kubernetes, _we have the power to spawn many services. As many of them as we would like. But how inbounds requests are routed among these services? _Ingressing _is a powerful way to decouple routing rules with core application logic. According to kubernetes, Ingress is a collection of rules that allow inbound connections to reach to reach cluster services.
